application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Approval of Details pursuant to Condition 3b and 3c (Materials - Windows and Metal panelling) of planning permission ref: P2022/3399/S73 dated: 29/11/2022 which granted consent for 'Proposed demolition of existing mansard storey and roof level plant installation and erection of a replacement fifth floor, new sixth floor, roof terrace with associated stair, lift access and WCs and mechanical plant at roof level with acoustic screening. Plus extensions at first to fourth floor to the River House rear elevation on Crawford Passage (including third to fifth floor balconies) and use of the first floor rear flat roofs as amenity terraces along with amendments to the ground level facade to facilitate new internal configuration'.
